summary: MY 1994 FORD F-150 IS SPILLING FUEL OUT OF THE FRONT TANK WHEN YOU FILL THE REAR TANK. I CONTACTED THE DEALER AND FOUND OUT THERE IS A RECALL ON 1990 THROUGH 1993 TRUCKS WITH DUAL TANKS. THIS RECALL SHOULD INCLUDE THE 1994 TRUCKS ALSO. THIS IS A FIRE HAZARD AND ENVIRONMENTAL HAZARD. AND SHOULD BE ADDRESSED IMMEDIATELY.    *NLM
